title: DeSantis seeks grand jury investigation of COVID-19 vaccines
author: FREIDA FRISARO; Associated Press
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis said Tuesday that he plans to petition to convene a grand jury to investigate "any and all wrongdoing" with COVID-19 vaccines.
cleaned_text: of COVID-19 vaccines by FREIDA FRISARO | Associated Press Incumbent Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis speaks to supporters at an election night party after winning his race for reelection in Tampa, Fla., Tuesday, Nov. 8, 2022, as his wife Casey listens. (AP Photo/Rebecca Blackwell)
